entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
